contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
I recently deployed my XbyK site to Azure. The Search worked fine locally but on the live site hosted in azure I am not getting any results. On my local version I noticed the search gen file is located in APP\_Data folder named i-g0000001-p\_True and has a lot of content, but on azure its i-g0000001-p\_False, and the folder is empty. Locally, the indexes are auto generated as I publish pages. Why isn't this happening on azure? I appreciate any insight.
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.3.1]
* .NET version: \[8]
* Execution environment: \[Azure]
* Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
